Description:
FAB, the UAE's largest bank and one of the world's most secure financial institutions, is dedicated to creating value for its employees, customers, shareholders, and communities. Through innovation, agility, and differentiation, FAB is committed to fostering growth.FAB GBS India is looking for top talent and your success is our success. Accelerate your growth as you help us reach our goals and advance your career. Be ready to make your mark a top company, in an exciting and dynamic industry. Job Purpose:To cover the purpose of the role or/& how this role would add value example: Principal Engineer, IB/MB Support is responsible for the delivery of the features related to FAB Mobile & Internet banking (both scrum delivery by service team or project & program delivery) that have interdependency amongst Services (within a Domain), other service lines and vendors. They make sure that requirements on the service squads’ backlog are prioritized and worked upon for timely implementation.Key Accountabilities:Generic AccountabilityPrincipal Engineer as part of the Service
Ideally through experience you will enhance your skills across multiple specialisationsJob Context:Specific Accountability (what is the day to day responsibilities)Works across multiple Service Delivery Teams

Infrastructure10-15 Years of Experience in SDLC or Service Management
Has 2 years’ experience in in Digital Transformation and Agile Ways of Working
Functions effectively as a Team Leader. Drives best practices inside and outside of organization.
Solves problems with high ambiguity
Effectively estimates time to implement design.
Thinks in terms of architecture as well as code.
Consistently makes systems simpler. Improves system interaction
Spends time reviewing code, configuration, and design, providing value-added feedback
Successfully launches projects of significant impact. Balances technology with business value
Mentors and guides Engineering or service Management Teams, in aspects of the engineering specialization or service management, monitoring, reporting, quality procedures, and timely execution of deliverables
Ensures technical debt is controlled and managed
Performs, assists and coaches on coding, scripting, automating, testing and technical design related best practices / principles
Analyses and guides the delivery team on E2E solution hosting and technical aspects of the platform
Strong technical background with key focus on automation
Proven track record of manual testing transformation to automation
Proven track record of driving uplift in an organization’s engineering practice, highly visible in the internal engineering community
Able to attract external talentJob Details
